vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_delall(unsigned short FlibHndl);

cmn.p:
Deletes all NC programs registered in CNC.
This function is a function equal with all NC program deletions by "O-9999".
The protected programs cannot be deleted.
In case of Series 15/15i, deletion is delayed under the following condition.

• Edit processing in the CNC side(include background edit processing)
• Downloading, verifying

is.p: Deletes all NC programs registered in CNC. This function is a function equal with all NC program deletions by "O-9999".
The protected programs cannot be deleted.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

item.name: EW_BUSY
item.content:
Busy
Series 15i(Ethernet only)
Background edit processing in CNC side Terminate background edit.
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend3, cnc_vrfend function.
"OP" signal(DO) on (only EDIT mode or MEMORY mode) Automatic operation is being executed on CNC.
Series 30i/31i/32i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend3, cnc_vrfend function.
Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C, Power Mate i
Background edit processing in CNC side Terminate background edit.
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend, cnc_vrfend function.
Alarm (PS000, PS101) on CNC side Reset the alarm on CNC.
MEMORY, MDI mode on CNC side Change CNC mode except MEMORY, MDI mode.
"OP" signal(DO) on (only EDIT mode or MEMORY mode) Automatic operation is being executed on CNC.

item.name: EW_PROT
item.content:
Write protection on CNC side
Protection KEY(DI) turns off. (Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C, Power Mate i)

item.name:
EW_PASSWD
(Ethernet)
item.content:
NC program cannot be deleted because the data is protected.
(Series 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C)

item.name: EW_BUSY
item.content:
Busy
Background edit processing in CNC side Terminate background edit.
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend3, cnc_vrfend function.
"OP" signal(DO) on (only EDIT mode or MEMORY mode) Automatic operation is being executed on CNC.

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D/F, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

cmn.span: This function can be used in any CNC mode.
It is possible to use in other than MEM, MDI mode.
